titles.title: National Vaccine Injury Compensation Program Modernization Act of 2009
To amend the Public Health Service Act to extend the deadlines applicable to filing petitions for compensation under the National Vaccine Injury Compensation Program.
National Vaccine Injury Compensation Program Modernization Act of 2009

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: National Vaccine Injury Compensation Program Modernization Act of 2009 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to extend the limitation period for filing a petition to compensate a vaccine-related injury under the National Vaccine Injury Compensation Program.
